item.title: Privacy where??
item.description: What made me to do this First of all, I dont need unnecessary propritory apps which I’m not using a while. The other main thing is I want to get rid of this Google, and badly want to remove all the google service including google play service and gfs. The only thing I’m concerned is, if i remove all the google services, i cant use upi scanner apps, banking apps for Indian bank and such things which makes me to hold to remove these google service
